text: Lioliai is a small town in Šiauliai County in northern-central Lithuania. As of 2011 population of Lioliai was 485. == Gallery == File:Liolių mokykla (2).JPG File:Liolių mokykla.JPG File:Lioliu Sv apastalu Simono ir Judo Tado baznycios varpine 2013.jpg File:Lioliai baznycia.jpg File:Lioliai.jpg File:Liolių kapinės.jpg File:Lioliai 2019.jpg Category:Towns in Europe Category:Settlements in Lithuania
title: Lioliai
